name: The Sims 4: Jungle Adventure
storyline:
Are your Sims up for some serious adventure? Get ready to explore a wilderness full of exciting discoveries, priceless relics and natural dangers.

Check a few things off your Sims' bucket lists with this incredible pack. Hang out in a new tropical destination or gear up and take on the excitement and danger of the jungle!

There's so much to do in this colorful locale, from trying out traditional dishes to dressing in the local fashions.

Your Sims will discover incredible natural beauties, ancient ruins and (of course) hidden dangers as they trek into the heart of the jungle.

Stumble upon mysterious temples full of priceless relics and deadly traps!

Excavate then examine your artifacts at the archeology table to discover which are fakes and which are priceless treasures.
summary: Explore a unique wilderness landscape in The Sims 4: Jungle Adventure, a game pack for The Sims 4, revealing a temple, jungle obstacles, cursed relics and treasures. Experience the culture and customs of Selvadorada, from devouring local eats to learning spicy new dance moves!
